title: Upgrade Doctrine Migrations from 2.x to 3.0 - Jonathan Scheiber
content: Following the major upgrade of Doctrine Migrations and its Symfony bundle from version 2.x to 3.0, several issues have risen. Some easy to adjust, others were more difficult. Let's see how to fix them all.

title: Make your PWA feel more like an app
content: Learn how to make your Progressive Web App feel like a "real" app by understanding how to implement native app patterns with web technologies.
